verbs.description: BRUSSELS ( AP ) - [ARG0: The European Union] [V: says] [ARG1: a sweeping new trade deal with Mexico is a signal to the rest of the world - including the Trump administration] .
BRUSSELS ( AP ) - The European Union says [ARG1: a sweeping new trade deal with Mexico] [V: is] [ARG2: a signal to the rest of the world - including the Trump administration] .
BRUSSELS ( AP ) - The European Union says a sweeping new trade deal with Mexico is a signal to [ARG2: the rest of the world] - [V: including] [ARG1: the Trump administration] .
